summary: I RECEIVED AN "IMPORTANT SAFETY RECALL" NOTICE 1 YEAR AGO IN JULY 2016 REGARDING A RECALL ON THE AIRBAGS OF MY VEHICLE. IT IS NOW JULY 2017 AND THEY SAY A REMEDY IS STILL NOT YET AVAILABLE. AIRBAGS ARE AN IMPORTANT SAFETY FEATURE OF A VEHICLE AND THEY HAVE HAD PLENTY OF TIME TO RECTIFY THIS.
